Class InventoryUsageDAO

java.lang.Object
database.InventoryUsageDAO
public class InventoryUsageDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for retrieving inventory usage information from the database. Provides methods to calculate total inventory usage within different time periods and to prepare data for visual charts.

    • InventoryUsageDAO

      public InventoryUsageDAO()

  • Method Details

    • getInventoryUsage

      public Map<String,Double> getInventoryUsage(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate)
      Retrieves a mapping of inventory items to their total usage between the specified start and end date.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the beginning of the time range
      endDate - the end of the time range
      Returns:
      a Map where the key is the inventory item name and the value is the total amount used

    • getLastWeekUsage

      public Map<String,Double> getLastWeekUsage()
      Retrieves inventory usage data for the past 7 days.
      Returns:
      a Map of item names and total usage values for the last week

    • getLastMonthUsage

      public Map<String,Double> getLastMonthUsage()
      Retrieves inventory usage data for the past 30 days.
      Returns:
      a Map of item names and total usage values for the last month

    • getTodayUsage

      public Map<String,Double> getTodayUsage()
      Retrieves inventory usage data for the current day.
      Returns:
      a Map of item names and total usage values for today

    • getUsageChartData

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Data<String,Number>> getUsageChartData(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate)
      Builds an observable list of usage data points formatted for use in JavaFX charts, within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the beginning of the time range
      endDate - the end of the time range
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of XYChart.Data objects containing item names and their total usage
